title: Update envelope overlay content to include centered heart icon between greeting and date

requirements.text: In `frontend/src/components/ValentineEnvelopeScene.tsx`, locate the Screen 1 envelope overlay block marked `/* Content */` (currently rendering only the "Hey Love" heading and the "14.02.2026" date) and replace it with the user-provided version that: (1) adds `text-center`, `space-y-3`, and `z-10` to the container, (2) removes the `mb-2` class from the heading, and (3) inserts a centered circular gradient heart icon block between the heading and the date using `<Heart className="text-white" size={30} fill="currentColor" />`. Keep the visible copy exactly "Hey Love" and "14.02.2026".

quotes: Find this part ... and replace it with ...

acceptanceCriteria: The envelope overlay content container uses `className="absolute inset-0 flex flex-col items-center justify-center text-center p-6 space-y-3 z-10"`.
The overlay shows three vertically-stacked elements in this order: "Hey Love" heading, circular gradient heart icon, and "14.02.2026" date.

The inserted heart icon block uses the exact classes `w-16 h-16 bg-gradient-to-br from-rose-500 to-rose-600 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center shadow-xl motion-safe:animate-pulse-glow` and renders a `Heart` icon with `size={30}` and `fill="currentColor"`.
The envelope's existing heart seal remains present and visually on top (its current `z-20` behavior is unchanged).

constraints: Do not edit files under `frontend/src/hooks/*` or `frontend/src/components/ui/*` (immutable paths).
Do not change any backend code; this request is frontend-only.
nonGoals: Changing any other copy, dates, or content outside the specified `/* Content */` overlay block.
Adding or removing animations beyond those already referenced by the provided Tailwind classes.

preferencesToAdd: Use English for any user-facing text in build requests.
